:::{.callout-note}
Oberon Citizen Science Network has been registered by NSW Fair Trading as an incoportated association under the _Associations Incorporation Act 2009_. The official registered name is **OBERON CITIZEN SCIENCE NETWORK INCORPORATED** and the registration number is **INC2400977**. The objectives of the association and its constitution as submitted with the registration application appear below.
:::
